name: @utkusarioglu/object-assist
description: A global library for some methods to help with dealing js objects
author: Utku Sarioglu <utkusarioglu@gmail.com> (http://www.utkusarioglu.com)

scripts.clean: shx rm -rf _bundles lib lib-esm index.d.ts index.js index.js.map package-lock.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir lib-esm && webpack
